belongs_to_collection.name: Louie Giglio: Hope - When Life Hurts Most

original_title: Louie Giglio: Hope - When Life Hurts Most: The Anchor of Hope
overview: Life isn't easy.  We experience problems and setbacks every day.  But during the hardest parts of life, when the bottom seems to fall out, where do we turn to peace?  God offers Himself and His cross as an anchor of hope no matter what we face in life.  The hope we find in Him allows us to leverage our darkest moments for His fame.
title: Louie Giglio: Hope - When Life Hurts Most: The Anchor of Hope
